attributes.action: Create a New Halifax - West Yorkshire Railway Station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the last Budget created by Alistair Darling, he ear-marked a Huge sum of money for the Transport Sector.

I urge the Prime Minister to ensure that some of these funds are ear marked for the creation of a NEW Halifax Railway Station, as there are currently Funding issues as per Network Rail.
